title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Summer Hours and Programs 2016
body: Summer Hours and Programs 2016          Morning fog hangs low on the site of the Jackson Flank Attack Buddy Secor       Subscribe  | What is RSS    News Release Date: June 3, 2016  Summer hours of operation and special summer programs will begin at all of the sites administered by Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania National Military Park on Saturday, June 11, 2016. Most of the programs are offered through Monday, September 5 (Labor Day), but all are available through Sunday, August 14, 2016.   Download the full summer schedule.    This schedule does not include special programs and events.    A separate schedule has been released for the park's popular History at Sunset programs.
